text:
What IS a coronavirus?

Coronaviruses (CoV) are "promiscuous" originating from various🐄 🦇&transmitted to humans▶️CoV circled in blue have been around for years📆& cause mild illness🤒, HOWEVER COV strains in red (SARS, MER and SARS2) are novel viruses & cause severe disease https://t.co/Iydhj2q1Zk
